hook.text: Save 70% of your income, retire at 35, and live off investments forever. That's the FIRE dream.

buildup.text: FIRE stands for Financial Independence, Retire Early. It emerged from online communities in the 2010s.

discovery.text: The math relies on the 4% rule: withdraw 4% of savings yearly and the money lasts 30+ years.

twist.text: Critics say FIRE requires high income, good health, and no major surprises. It's not for everyone.
